example.eg: The HR team revised the staff guidelines.
Veronica has an exam on Tuesday, so she's revising.
example.egtrans: 维罗妮卡周二要考试，现在正在复习。

example.eg: Robert is revising for an exam.
example.egtrans: 罗伯特为一场考试复习功课。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 为…复习, 为…复习功课

example.eg: I need to revise irregular verbs for the French test tomorrow.
example.egtrans: 明天有法语考试，我要复习一下不规则动词。

example.eg: Walter revised his opinion of the young man after listening to Mrs. Bradshaw singing his praises.
Emma revised the figures according to the new forecast.
